semantic_identifier: [GOLD-134]: Zendesk/Intercom ingest: make conversation syncing idempotent to prevent duplicate issue evidence
title: Zendesk/Intercom ingest: make conversation syncing idempotent to prevent duplicate issue evidence

sections.text: Zendesk/Intercom read-only ingest occasionally creates duplicate conversation records and re-attaches the same evidence to multiple issues when a sync is retried or overlapping time windows are pulled. Add idempotency keys (source + conversation/message IDs) and upsert behavior so repeated syncs do not create new records. Ensure dedupe happens before clustering so themes and impacted-customer counts remain stable across sync runs.
